channel.title: blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: I like automations for inclusive development
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: I like deploying robots to include more of the team in our core development loop</body></html>

item.title: Dance like the bots aren't watching?
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: Why bother sharing anything on the open web if it's just going to be fodder for extractive, non-reciprocal bots?</body></html>
